~

signatures.name: injected.hidden-div.053
signatures.cleanup_pattern: ~<div style=\W+font-size:1pt; line-height:2pt; height:auto; position: absolute; z-index:99999999;\W+>(\s*<a style=\W+color:[^>]+>[^<]+<\/a>)+\s*<\/div>~
